channel.title: [508] NPC's
channel.description:
Hi guys, i was just wondering if anybody knows how to code in a few NPC's? I am deciding to scrap my 317 and move on to 508's but i need help D:
The thing i am trying to acheive is add NPC's to train on and also add NPC's just beneath the wilderness so that you can get food, change spell book etc.
Can anybody help me?
(Didn't know if this was correct Section, sorry if it isn't)
